date.description: Date of submission in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD

type.description: The options are: 'initial' for first submission, 'followup' is for followup submissions, 'addition' for additional submission, 'correction' for correction

submitterId.description: LE ID as specified by the BfArM or RVO

genomicDataCenterId.description: Id of the genomic data center, format GDCXXXnnn 9-digit assigned by BfArM

clinicalDataNodeId.description: Id of the clinical data node, format KDKXXXnnn 9-digit assigned by BfArM

diseaseType.description: Type of disease (must be oncological or hereditary for Oncology object, rare for RareDiseasesObject)

presentationDate.description: Date of delivery. Date (in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD) on which the Model Project Declaration of Participation was presented to the patient, unless identical to the date of signature

version.description: Version of the declaration of participation. Name and version of the declaration of participation in the MV GenomSeq, e.g.: 'Patient Info TE Consent MVGenomSeq vers01'

scope.description: Modules of the consent to MV: must have at least a permit of mvSequencing

type.description: Consent or refusal to participate and consent, must be indicated for each option listed in the scope of consent.

date.description: Date of signature of the pilot projects consent; in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD.

researchConsents.description: Research consents. Multiple declarations of consent are possible! Must be assigned to the respective data sets.

presentationDate.description: Date of the delivery of the research consent in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

scope.description: Scope of the research consent in JSON format following the MII IG Consent v2025 FHIR schema. See 'https://www.medizininformatik-initiative.de/Kerndatensatz/KDS_Consent_V2025/MII-IG-Modul-Consent.html' and 'https://packages2.fhir.org/packages/de.medizininformatikinitiative.kerndatensatz.consent'.

birthDate.description: Date of birth without the day. Format YYYY-MM

addressAGS.description: Official municipal code of the patient's residence.

decisionToInclude.description: Decision of the multidisciplinary case conference in the field of diagnostics on the inclusion of the insured person in the pilot project

inclusionBoardDecisionDate.description: Date of the decision of the multidisciplinary case conference in the field of diagnostics on the inclusion of the insured person in the pilot project
